content: vote vote vote option 2 the 2024 us presidential election is the most consequential we have ever faced i felt it was important as an ordinary citizen to do what i could to encourage voter participation knowing what a powerful cohort the knitting community can be i wanted to create a hat to get the message out this pattern is free and i hope you will consider not only making a hat for all of your friends but also to use it for fundraising to donate to candidates school board candidates especially need funds there are five options for the stranded section see the chart options this hat uses bulky yarn for a fast knit and features colorwork in two colors for bold graphics it s a simple pattern and i hope that the stranded knitting is easy enough to encourage people who have never tried it to give it a go size one size for adults gauge 15 sts and 20 row = 4 inches 10 cm with larger needles needles us 9 and us 10 us 10 double pointed needed for crown shaping yarn bulky less than one skein each of the following yarns color a cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in aporto color b cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in feather grey color c cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in ruby directions hat knit in the round using smaller needles and color a cast on 76 sts pm join to work in rounds rnds 1 12 k2 p2 repeat to end change to larger needles rnds 13-18 knit change to color b rnds 19-21 knit with color b rnds 22-31 follow colorwork chart don t forget to trap your floats on the longer stretches of one color in the chart rnds 32-34 knit with color b round 35 change to color a reduce by 4 stitches evenly spaced in the round 72 stitches remain round 36 knit 8 pm repeat to end of round start decreases to shape the top round 37 k to 2 stitches before the marker k2tog sm round 38 k repeat rounds 37-38 until there is one stitch left between the markers break yarn leaving approximately an 8 tail thread yarn onto yarn needle and pull through remaining stitches and draw up tightly fasten securely and weave in ends and don t forget to vote chart 1 option chart 2 option chart 3 option chart 4 option chart 5 option chart 6 option 76 76 76 76 75 75 75 75 74 74 74 74 73 73 73 73 72
